casebody.data:
No. 10-218. PPL Montana, LLC, Petitioner v. Montana. 564 U.S. 1018, 131 S. Ct. 3019,

180 L. Ed. 2d 843,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4767. June 20, 2011.

Motion of Professor David Emmons, et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Montana granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.

Same case below, 355 Mont. 402, 229 P.3d 421.
